column1: * 1915 - Newly-commissioned wikipedia:Second Lieutenant J.R.R. Tolkien enters army training camp.
* 1947 - Author and scholar Colin Duriez is born.
* 1950 - Voice actor Simon Cadell is born.
* 1969 - Voice actress Courtenay Taylor is born.
* 1981 - The twentieth episode of the The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series) of The Lord of the Rings is aired on BBC.
